key_phrases: fill critical gaps in Austin’s creative ecosystem
wellness stipends for artists dealing with burnout, trauma, or financial stress
breathing room to create without survival mode
data ownership, digital strategy, AI, and creative tech tools
affordable rehearsal, recording, gallery, and performance space
participatory grantmaking creates equity and trust while redistributing power
documenting and archiving the stories of communities often excluded
barriers_identified: burnout, trauma, or financial stress for artists
limited access to digital tools and knowledge
lack of artist participation in funding decisions
disconnect between youth and elder cultural workers
solutions_proposed: mental health services, peer support groups, and wellness stipends for artists
pilot or ongoing basic income program for artists
workshops, mentorships, or services around data ownership, digital strategy, AI, and creative tech tools
affordable rehearsal, recording, gallery, and performance space plus creative residencies that include housing, stipends, and community integration
artist-led grantmaking panels and participatory grantmaking
support for documenting and archiving community stories
